author: craigmcc
msg: Refine the context.release() patch from Piero Colagrosso.  We must call
context.release() *only* if we were the ones that actually created a new
FacesContext.  Otherwise, the context object will be released twice (once
by us, and once by the JSF runtime) with undefined results -- with the
JSF RI, for example, this combination triggers an IllegalStateException
error in the servlet container's logs.
Also, applied the same mechanism to the non-Tiles request processor as well,
to avoid the potential for creating dangling FacesContext instances that are
never cleaned up.

author: akarasulu
msg: Commit changes ...
o added eve.schema matching rules with associated normalizers and comparators
o cleaned up docos in abst ctx partition
o made caseExactMatch and caseExactIA5Match synonymous (THIS MAY BE A MISTAKE)
o eve.schema only depends on the system schema
Notes ...
If there are weird behavoirs down the road investigate undoing the add
of caseExactMatch to the caseExactIA5Match attribute.

author: akarasulu
msg: finalized system schema

author: crossley
msg: Add the version number to the build message.

author: craigmcc
msg: Revert the big changes because it would not compile against Struts 1.1.
However, also tweak the generated JavaScript function names to be sensitive
to the different Commons Validator versions included with 1.1 and 1.2.4.
